name: Virtual Battle With Corona
description:
Now we have to stay inside because of the Corona Virus. So we cannot actually go out and shoot it that's pretty dangerous and also not possible. So we made an game In which You can have a battle with the Corona Virus. Basically There are 10 Levels In each levels there are liquids antinodes Find all of them to kill the Corona Virus (But Virtually).

Thank You,

Regards, 

Safal.Tech
